data.title: NOBEL PRIZE WINNING MATHEMATICIAN HERBERT HAUPTMAN HAND SIGNED FDC FIRST DAY COVER D.2011
data.text: My name is Mark Vardakis, I`ve been an autograph collector/dealer since 1980 and issued retail sales catalogues for 15 consecutive years selling over 20,000 autographs. As former New England Regional Director of the U.A.C.C. (UNIVERSAL AUTOGRAPH COLLECTORS CLUB) I had several historical articles published including co-authoring a landmark signature study of JFK. All my autographs are guaranteed to be authentic hand signed examples, not copies or autopen. I offer a 2 week return privilege if you are not satisfied or find an item to be not as described. If you feel you are interested in an item but do not agree with the price, I would consider a counter offer. I can be reached if you have questions at vardakismark@yahoo.com
